website_summaries.verdict: This long-lasting concealer may work for customers with oily skin or those who prefer lighter coverage, but it may be disappointing for others with dry skin or imperfections that need full coverage.
pros: Blends quickly into the skin and provides coverage for up to 24 hours
Doesn't tend to cake or settle into creases
cons: Has the tendency to be somewhat drying to the skin
Coverage may be too shear to cover dark circles, blemishes, and other imperfections

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Dryness is inevitable as our skin matures. My skin has been so dry and after lots of trial and error with different brands, I settled on Smashbox. It is creamy and does not cake or dry up after application. Well, I take that back. It did clump one time but I realized that it was my new moisturizer that unfortunately just sat on top of my skin and took forever to absorb. So if it ever happens to you, it's probably not this concealer but your moisturizer, esp those with sunblock. Hope they do not discontinue this line.
customer_reviews.author: lacali

customer_reviews.title: Smashbox has made a truly great concealer. This is a well pigmented concealer that ...
customer_reviews.text: Smashbox has made a truly great concealer. This is a well pigmented concealer that is not only waterproof but will not fade throughout the day. Onee application is truly all you will need, even in the heat and humidity of summer. The price is a bit much but I think it is worth the extra dollars. My only complaint is it can feel a bit dry but waterproof concealers (if you can find them) have a tenancy to be a little dryer than a basic concealer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Corn

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: I love Smashbox products so I anticipated the same feeling about this concealer. It works well, but it does not smell nice. It has a strange odor that you smell all day after you put it on. I wish smashbox would bring back their stick concealer. It was the best!
customer_reviews.author: patricia masterton

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: This was just a tad dark for my under eye complexion, but I've used the lighter one and that was too light so I kinda have to make it work. It's very thick so I suggest using a damp blending sponge. It's a really good product though and it lasts a long time after you apply it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product - it works!

I love the way it is applied with the wand and that it's waterproof. This is important since I live in Florida year round. I believe it helps me to look younger than my years. I definitely recommend this product!

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reaction on my skin

Very disappointed to say but I will never use this product again.
